dcterms:description: The Pascal-Context dataset is used for object detection and semantic segmentation tasks, providing a rich set of annotations for various categories in natural scenes.
dcterms:title: Pascal-Context

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. J. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams

dcterms:description: The Pascal-VOC 2012 dataset is a benchmark for object detection and segmentation, featuring a diverse set of images and annotations across multiple object categories.
dcterms:title: Pascal-VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran

T. Rehfeld

dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various urban scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
